name: Cyber Webber (Saschanian)
description:
WEBGL VERSION HEAVLY BUGGED

PLEASE DOWNLOAD TO GET THE FULL EXPERIENCE

KNOWN BUGS: 

Shooting the web does not always register. 

Web pick-up respawns after death, granting infinite webs.

Timer gets weird when reaching minutes.

DESCRIPTION:

Your user downloaded a questionable game. Your task now is to search the files and look for any potential threats.

Use your handy webs to maneuver the files and notify the user of any possible malware.

Shoot your webs using the left mouse button and jump off your webs with the space bar. Find additional webs throughout the levels, making puzzles significantly easier/ even possible.

Find 3 unique collectables scathered throughout the files to decorate your main menu.
